pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plot Full ROC Curves using Eyewitness Lineup Data // Enable researchers to adjust identification rates using the 1/(lineup size) method, generate the full receiver operating characteristic (ROC) curves, and statistically compare the area under the curves (AUC). References: Yueran Yang Andrew Smith. (2020). "fullROC: An R package for generating and analyzing eyewitness-lineup ROC curves". doi:10.13140/RG.2.2.20415.94885/1 , Andrew Smith, Yueran Yang, Gary Wells. (2020). "Distinguishing between investigator discriminability and eyewitness discriminability: A method for creating full receiver operating characteristic curves of lineup identification performance". Perspectives on Psychological Science, 15(3), 589-607. doi:10.1177/1745691620902426.
